headline: CDN-Cache-Control: Precision Control for your CDN(s)
keywords: CDN, Cache, Cache-Control, Product News, Headers
description: Today we are thrilled to announce our support of a new set of HTTP response headers that provide surgical control over our CDNâ€™s caching decisions. CDN-Cache-Control allows customers to directly control how our CDN behaves without affecting the behavior of downstream or upstream caches.
